text: Alborz Province (, OstƒÅn-e Alborz ) is one of the 31 provinces of Iran. Its capital is Karaj. Alborz Province was created by division of Tehran Province into two provinces, after the Parliamentary approval on 23 June 2010, and was introduced as the 31st province of Iran.Majlis extends term of councils, votes for new province, Tehran Times, Retrieved on 24 June 2010. == References == Category:Establishments in Iran Category:2010 establishments in Asia
title: Alborz province
